subject: Baseball
Olympic Games
Steroids
Tests and Testing
lead_paragraph: José Jimenez, who threw a no-hitter as a rookie with the St. Louis Cardinals in 1999, was one of two Dominican athletes removed from the Pan American Games yesterday after they tested positive for banned substances. Jimenez, who last pitched in the majors for the Cleveland Indians in 2004, tested positive for anabolic steroids. The boxer Rafael Fernandez Sosa was also barred by the Dominican Republic Olympic committee.
